item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: Vtuber Animator
item.description:
About This Software

What can Vtuber Animator do?

Vtuber Animator is a VRM model animation player that can synchronize animations in real-time to live streaming software via the OSC protocol.

Featured

  • Support *.vrm model
  • Support *.vmd and mixamo fbx animations
  • Support *.vpd poses
  • Animations can be switched using hotkeys

How to use?

In Vtuber Animator:
Press "Model+" then select your model through the file picker
Enter ip and a port and press "Connect"
Press "Import" in "Motion List",then select your motion through the file picker
Press "Play" button

In VSeeFace:
Enable the "OSC/VMC Receiver (Disable Tracking)" option in VSeeFace, and input the same port as entered in Vtuber Animator.
Optionally toggle "Apply VSeeFace Tracking" and any other toggles underneath it if you only want to perform partial poses.

item.title: Blood Engine
item.description:
About This Game


In the year 2058, the world is on the brink of collapse due to overpopulation and dwindling resources. In a covert mining and research facility, tucked away in an undisclosed location, a ground-breaking discovery unfolded, a metallic bacteria capable of melding seamlessly with both organic matter and metals.

Driven by the desperation of governments and militaries, they experimented with combining the metallic bacteria with human DNA. Creating the ultimate soldier, the Blood Engine. However, the experimental bacteria proved unpredictable, mutating uncontrollably and giving rise to an epidemic of mindless biomechanical cyborgs known as The Red Swarm.



Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey as a Blood Engine soldier, activated by a science engineer, moments before he was killed. The player awakens to find themselves trapped in a military mining and research facility, now infested with The Red Swarm. The entire complex is encased in an impenetrable electrified dome sealing you, survivors, and the Red Swarm within.

Navigate the treacherous terrain of the infected complex, battling through hordes of biomechanical adversaries, rescuing survivors, and restoring power and control. The fate of the world hangs in the balance as you strive to eliminate the threat before it spills beyond the confines of the facility.

Blood Engine immerses you in an intense and challenging third-person open-world experience, delivering thrills and suspense as you race against time to thwart a global catastrophe. Will you emerge victorious against the relentless Red Swarm, or succumb to the biomechanical onslaught? The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

item.title: A Maze Dream: the puzzle journey
item.description:
About This Game

Maze Dream is a mix of a maze and puzzles. In this game, you control a sheep prince with the power of the cloud and your objective is to reach the end of the level and jump over the fence.


JUMP THE FENCE


Your objective is to reach the end of each maze and jump over the fence to move on to the next level.


LEARN FROM YOUR MISTAKES


To err is human, I say sheep... learn from your mistakes and play it again, without life points in the dream world.


MANAGE YOUR POWER CARDS


Use your powers to cross the maze, relax and think a little before acting as your resources are limited.


USE THE ENVIRONMENT


Study and analyze the terrain and how you interact with it, this could be the solution to the puzzle.


UNLOCK SECRETS


In some levels you will find secrets, a magic letter or a key without a lock, collect what you can to unlock new experiences.

Use all your cards to beat the maze

item.title: One Hour And A Straight Line
item.description:
About This Game

Go to the end of the "line", you have all the time you need. If you want a challenge try to make it in less than an hour and compete for the leaderboard.

One Hour And A Straight Line (OHSL) is a mix between Parkour and FPS games with a little musical twist and a relaxed vibe.

On this little linear journey you will have:


  • Wall Riding as the main movement mechanic. You will be wall riding/climbing 95% of the time. With an unique setup allowing complete control of your movements while wall riding.

  • Musical Guns instead of normal guns. Shoot to the beat of melodies.

  • Platform building: Farm blocks with your musical guns, then place and wallride on them to avoid gaps or obstacles and maximize your speed.

item.title: Wonderway
item.description:
About This Game

Wonderway is a puzzle game where the direction of gravity can be changed. Everything in this game interacts with gravity. You can change the position of items by arrows and portals, utilize cores of energy doors to create passages or blocks, use arrow-shifters to control the direction of arrows, and even separate the gravity of character from the space. Explore many more mechanics and get to the goal by moving and manipulating every items in the levels.

The game has over 170 hand-crafted puzzles which experiment with the game's mechanics in a multitude of ways. Each puzzle contains at least one new idea, which showcases the wonder of the way to the goal. Hope you enjoy exploring and solving these puzzles.

item.title: Meteora's Mystic Merge
item.description:
About This Game

Meteora's Mystic Merge is a puzzle game based on the famous Suika game. Instead of fruits it uses a variety of vtubers as assets. Meteora's Mystic Merge features currently only a new game mode with a playable character (namely Meteora) who has a special ability, and a classic mode coming soon which plays a lot like the original though with some changes.

This game is similar to the cult game "2048" as well as "Suika Game" which is a switch exclusive.

Gameplay:

Combine two of the same character/object to get to the next one.
Try to get to the final Meteora without exceeding the glass or throwing any objects outside of it.
On the right side you can see a little graph which explains the progression levels.
Though the first ones seem rather easy, getting to the final Meteora is challenging to say the least

Maybe you will get her:

item.title: Camping Vlog Simulator 2024
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the serene beauty of nature with "Camping Vlog Simulator"!


Immerse yourself in the great outdoors and experience the tranquility of camping in stunning virtual landscapes. Witness breathtaking sunsets and pitch your tent under starry skies: This game lets you live the life of a digital nature enthusiast. Record your camping adventures and share them with the world as you embark on a realistic camping experience. With stunning graphics and captivating gameplay, it's time to escape into the wilderness from the comfort of your own home. Start your adventure today and ignite your passion for the great outdoors!

Features:


  • Expansive virtual camping environments to explore.
  • Realistic day-night cycles and dynamic weather.
  • A variety of camping equipment and gear to use.
  • Campfire cooking and food preparation mechanics.
  • Immersive soundscapes to enhance the camping experience.
  • A progression system to unlock new locations and equipment.
  • In-game tips and tutorials for novice campers.

item.title: Christmas Journey to Santa
item.description:
About This Game

Christmas Journey to Santa is a relaxing platformer game about a snowman who dreams of meeting Santa Claus on Christmas Eve. He sets off on a long journey to fulfill his wish. Traveling around the world, he meets obstacles on his way, collects magic red coins to present to Santa. A magical atmosphere and positive emotions await children and adults in the game.

item.title: Enkindle
item.description:
About This Game

A relaxing and wholesome "clear-up" cooking game. Match 3 objects to cook them in the pan. Don't let the pan get too full. Clear all the objects, clear your mind.



  • Match 3 objects to cook them in the pan
  • Don't let the pan get too full
  • Clear all the objects to pass the level
  • Perfect game for those that get satisfaction from clearing up clutter or hearing the sound of food sizzling.



  • Relaxing sounds that help you relax
  • If you like the sound of food sizzling, this game is perfect for you.



  • Lots of unique level variations
  • Randomly generated levels for unlimited relaxation.



  • Over 200+ unique items
  • Physics-based items



  • Just tap on an item
  • Simple satisfying gameplay

Features:

  • Relaxing music and effects.
  • No timers, play at your own pace.
  • Over 200+ physics items.
  • Lots of unique level variations.
  • Quick levels. Levels range from 30 seconds up to 5 minutes.
  • Intuitive controls, just tap the item.
  • Helps you relax and de-stress.
  • Easy to pick up and play. Fun for all ages.
  • Various gameplay, graphics, and performance settings.

item.title: UNICYCLIST
item.description:
About This Game

UNICYCLIST is a simple and easy to learn but hard to master physics-based platformer. It features 20 base game levels with a variety of static, dynamic, hinge and spring based obstacles.

item.title: Arcane Bastion
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an epic journey as a formidable mage, tasked with defending your castle against relentless waves of monsters. Brace yourself for a challenging battle that demands not only your magical prowess but also strategic thinking. Engage in intense combat using an array of powerful spells and a diverse collection of magic scrolls, each with unique effects to annihilate your enemies.

Immerse yourself in the captivating world of this game, featuring stunning graphics and immersive sound effects that enhance the overall gaming experience. Unleash the might of six distinct weapons of sorcery, each offering a different tactical advantage in your fight against the hordes of zombies and monsters.

Navigate through the perilous waves of adversaries, constantly adapting your strategy and upgrading your spells using a sophisticated spell upgrade system. As you progress, witness the enhancement of your magical abilities, enabling you to vanquish even the most formidable monsters.

With a multitude of challenges, an arsenal of magical weaponry, and an intriguing spell upgrade system, the game promises an exhilarating experience for those ready to face the ultimate test of skill and magic. What are you waiting for? Dive into the fray, protect your castle, and showcase the true extent of your magical prowess!

item.title: The Last Braincell
item.description:
About This Software

Ever want to watch your last brain cell bounce around like a loveable logo? Well this program lets you do exactly that, and you can blow them up! And you can upload any PNG you want to your files for it! they're in your documents folder upon downloading them! Have fun and let all of the world know of your explosive personality. Our program uses Unreal Engine 4 to make any PNG you upload to the right folder bounce around a screen sized 1920 * 1080 (resizeable within aspect ratio) window like it's the last brain cell you have bouncing around that head of yours. With customizable background space and pngs you can also use your mouse to brain blast every last bouncy thought in that window of yours.

To add your own assets simply navigate to "Documents\TLBCSprites" then put any .png you wish to use into it's respective folder, I.E. braincells into Documents\TLBCSprites\Braincells
Please not that at this time the import only works with .png however more support is planned for the future

item.title: Serbian Dancing Lady
item.description:
About This Game

Story

This game is based on a popular urban legend about a strange dancing woman. If you are very unlucky, you can meet her at night in deserted places. She is engrossed in her dancing and probably won't pay attention to you unless you get close, but if she does notice you, you'd better run‚Ä¶

Gameplay

This game is a classic indie horror game. You need to explore the level looking for pictures. You have no weapons and no way to defend yourself, when you meet the Serbian lady you only have to run away.
There are 3 levels available to you:
Forest. In the forest you need to explore the location to find 10 pictures of creepy creatures. Find all the pictures before the Serbian lady finds you.
School. At night, when all the people are already out of earshot, it seems that someone has performed some terrible ritual in this school and now this creature has appeared here‚Ä¶ It seems to be aggressive only in the dark, and you have a flashlight, so everything is fine. Except the flashlight runs out of batteries quickly‚Ä¶
Abandoned hospital. You woke up in some abandoned building on the outskirts of the city and a Serbian lady is chasing you. All you have to do is run. Get to the exit and don't let the Serbian lady catch you.

Atmosphere

Thanks to Unreal Engine 5 technology, the game has realistic graphics and detailed environments. Character movement animations are close to the movements of a real person with a video camera.

item.title: Being John
item.description:
About This Game

Being John is a 3rd Person life simulation game. Help John to regain his lost life.
You need to earn money, improve your relationships with people, take care of your health and improve your charisma in order to make John happy on Bozca Island.
To improve your relationships with people you can focus on their interests, talk to them and give them gifts.
To make money, follow advertisements, buy, sell or rent houses. Do sports, read books, take care of your clothes to improve your charisma.
It's up to you to make John happy.

item.title: Lights Off: Director's Cut
item.description:
About This Game

Lights Off: Director's Cut

Welcome to "Lights Off: Director's Cut", an immersive horror game that preys on the universal childhood fear of darkness. This fully re-imagined edition of the acclaimed indie game plunges you into a chilling atmosphere where the simple act of turning off the lights becomes your worst nightmare.

Game Features:

Seven Nights of Terror: Each night, the darkness grows more suffocating, and the horrors lurking in the shadows become more cunning.

Three Distinct Endings: Can you find all three?

Steam Achievements: Unlock Steam Achievements for finding the secret endings

Fully Free: "Lights Off: Director's Cut" is completely free to play. Experience the full terror without spending a dime.

Dare to Turn Off the Lights?

item.title: Ninja Frogs
item.description:
About This Game

The frog village needs your help to fight against evil mutant alligators.

‚òÖ Dash, dodge and land-kicks on heads in order to defeat your alligators enemies.
‚òÖ Jump into this thrilling game of ninja movements and magic scrolls power-ups.
‚òÖ Do the impossible to beat down the alligators spread out in your village.
‚òÖ Swap for a variety of ninja frog heroes with different missions and personalities.
‚òÖ Collect your rewards to buy new maps, new heroes and abilities.

Easy to learn, hard to master.

item.title: Vox Populi: Brazil 2022
item.description:
About This Game

Play as an existing or fully customized political figure, and campaign for the Brazilian presidential election of 2022 or many other alternative elections! In "Vox Populi: Brazil 2022", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

  • Choose from a host of different scenarios that place the country in various realistic or fictional situations on different dates.
  • Recruit your campaign team from a variety of characters, based on their ideologies or traits.
  • Act directly on your nation's regions or sociological targets to impact their political opinions and voting intentions.
  • Adapt your strategy to the actions of your opponents and place obstacles in their path.
  • Face up to the many unforeseen events that will shake up the country's political life.
  • Collect dozens of cards that will help you in the great national debates.

This game includes:

  • Seven different scenarios, past or future, many with randomisation for replayability, adapted to the country's history and politics
  • A detailed, fully customisable character creator
  • Dozens of pre-existing or randomly generated characters
  • Dozens of unique ideologies and corpuses
  • A realistic subdivision of Brazil into regions and sociological categories, each with its own characteristics
  • Flexible character actions that allow for a wide variety of gameplay
  • 80 unique events
  • Dozens of character traits that influence their actions or debates
  • 50 varied cards for dynamic debates between characters
  • A unique system of parliament and political coalitions based on the ideologies of each candidate
  • Detailed collections of data and statistics to track the evolution of the electorate and your campaign
  • And much more to discover!

item.title: The Zhukov Line
item.description:
About This Game



The Zhukov Line is a short one-room-horror which takes place on a livestock train in a dystopian Soviet state.



First day on the job...
Accepting a new job as a transport supervisor for the Chernovar Oversight Division you have been tasked with transporting a special livestock specimen. As you awake on a cold iron train, you hear ungodly screams from the coaches behind you. Scrambling to your computer, you read your mission statement and learn that the only way to survive is by keeping the specimen restrained, by maintaining industrial grade systems built into the train



Keep the train running...
Can you keep the systems repaired long enough to reach your destination and escape the aberrant monstrosity tearing its way through the train carriages to meet you?

item.title: Real Traveler
item.description:
About This Game

„ÄêGame description„Äë
There is no such thing as a story.
In a world erosion by monsters, I, a villager, will stand up!
You can use money to increase fellow, strengthen equipment, and buy houses.
Organize your life, defeat monsters with your fellow, and explore the vast world!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/explanation1.jpg
„ÄêHow to proceed with the game„Äë

Players become adventurers who defeat monsters that live in various environments, earn money, and improve the life around them.


There are limits to the power of one person alone. You can hire adventurers in town, increase your number of fellow, give instructions to your fellow, and defeat monsters together. *You can add up to 10 fellow.


Money can be used in a variety of ways, including hiring adventurers, strengthening equipment, unlocking skills, and using shops.
Let's go on an adventure!


„Äêperspective„Äë
3rd person view only.

„ÄêMethod of operation„Äë
Keyboard + mouse only.
„ÄêPlayer operation„Äë
„Éª[Tab] Item column.
„Éª[M]Map.
„Éª[Left mouse click] action.
„ÄêMoving method„Äë
„ÉªMove the player using the [W][A][S][D] keys.
„ÉªMove the player's viewpoint using [mouse operation].
„ÉªUse the [mouse wheel] to zoom or zoom out.
„Éª[Shift long press] Dash.
„ÄêGive instructions to your Friend„Äë
„ÉªPress the [Q] button to switch palettes ‚Üí switch members.
„ÉªSelect members using keys [0] to [9].
„Éª[Right mouse click] Select all allies.
„Éª[Mouse wheel click] Deselect all allies.
„Éª[Left mouse click] Moves the allies to the specified position.
„Éª[R] Instructions to run to friends.
„Éª[F] Move all allies to the formation position (You can specify the position of the [Member] formation from the inventory by pressing the [Tab] key.)

item.title: Petris
item.description:
About This Game

Petris is a new tiling game in the style of the 80's. Stripes (rectangles) fall from the sky, They can be horizontal or vertical stripes. Each 3 strips, from the same type, form a square. You can Not combine both horizontal and vertical stripes into a square.
Rotate the shapes as they fall down, and move them left or right. The goal is to create as many lines as you can in the game. When you have 10 horizontal full squares - that is a full line. The line will be taken off and anything above it will fall down. Your aim is to make a much lines as possible, as you progress the game will be faster and faster. If there is no space for more stripes to fall - the game is over.

item.title: Looking For Love
item.description:
About This Game

Stupid Cupid has made a fine mess of this. He's found the perfect match for all of blobdom, but he didn't know the bouncy blobs can't turn on their own! Love is within reach, but they're all looking in the wrong direction.



That's where you come in: it's your job to spin them around until two matching blobs are facing each other. When they lock eyes on their one true love, they'll roll forward and dissolve into each other. Dreamy!



If you want to make light work of Cupid's calamity, you can prepare combos to turn each level into an unashamed lovefest. Just line up blobs that have an obstacle in their way and the star-cross'd blobs will seek each other out once it disappears from the level.



Of course there's nothing simple about love, and the blobs come in a multitude of flavours. Some are a little greedier than others and want to find two loves-of-their-life. Others fancy something a little less straightforward and will will fall for blobs not only of their matching colour, but from across the spectrum of blobkind.


Features:


  • 160 hand-crafted levels of varying difficulties
  • Three unique blob types to discover and master
  • Four amazing sets, each with their own combination of blobs
  • Target scores add replay value ‚Äì can you beat the best score on every level?
  • Original music

item.title: Recolit
item.description:
About This Game

Recolit is a pixel art puzzle-adventure game where you search for lights in a town where night never ends.

Your spaceship crushes, and you find yourself in a dark town that looks just like any other, but that has something different about it. Its people go about their daily lives as if nothing was off, even though the sky above their heads is always black.

This person wants something to drink. This other person wants to play with a pigeon.
As you help them with these little, trivial things, you advance toward what really matters.

And then, the mysterious girl you met along the way tells you something:
"All right. I'll wait for you."

item.title: Missile Wars
item.description:
About This Game

In Missile Wars players will defend their asteroid from waves of incoming enemy missiles, invest in crucial tech upgrades and launch decisive countermeasures.

Defence requires timing, dexterity, prediction and precision using VR or keyboard & mouse. Targets must be prioritised based on threat-level and proximity, and despatched efficiently. A missed shot could have dire consequences.

Between waves players must manage their economy in order to invest in the tactical upgrades required to shift the balance of power. Is now the right time to put the enemy on the back foot with a devastating new missile - or better to hold back, beefing up the defences and vital resources?

As the match progresses the pressure ramps up; incoming missile waves are more numerous and varied, environmental events such as sandstorms and meteor strikes complicate the battlefield until one side's defences are breached. With their shields down, cities in ruin, and economy in tatters their asteroid is surely moments away from collapse - but could there be one last gasp at victory?

Features

  • VR Support
  • Online PVP in 1v1 and 2v2 modes
  • Online Co-operative play in Survival mode
  • Post-match stats

item.title: blue ocean
item.description:
About This Game

Friend, this game may seem simple, but in reality it is very challenging
Pixel blocks keep scrolling forward, but there are objects in front of them. Do you need to adjust the position of the blocks by moving left and right to avoid conflicts or drops?
Gameplay:
It will continue to move forward, you need to manipulate it to avoid traps and obstacles! Otherwise, you will fail!
Game features:
A thrilling game
Exercise your quick reaction ability
You need dazzling controls to play to the end!

item.title: Blue eyes
item.description:
About This Game

This game is simple and interesting,



Using happy emoticons as the background, people can feel happiness at a glance. Balls, blocks, or capsules of different colors are fired from below at different speeds. Players need to click on the ball with the mouse to detonate it. How about it, is it very simple and also very stress relieving? Hurry up and call your friends to give it a try!

Gameplay:

There will be various items thrown up from below, you need to click on these items with the mouse!

Of course, you cannot click on dangerous items such as bombs, otherwise....

Game features:

-The most interesting and irresistible quick response game;

-Collect crazy and interesting legendary blades to gain an advantage in defeating opponents;

-Beautiful art style, fun and cute games;

-Experience the pleasure of small games and enjoy the joy to the fullest;

item.title: Crayon Computer
item.description:
About This Game

Crayon Computer is a 2D physics-based open-ended programming puzzle game.

Key features:
Draw physical objects to perform different operations: classify objects, compare weight, or even build logic gates.
Explore one of the most inefficient computing systems that ever existed.
Argue with programming game fans about whether or not this counts as programming.

item.title: CarprogramVR
item.description:
About This Game

*This is a VR-only app that runs on SteamVR.

An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

These objects will be programmed when you place them on the road.

Placing cardboard that has the name of an image file will display that image.
Placing cardboard and adding a note to it will display the message in the note.
Placing a calculator with a mathematical expression attached to it will evaluate that expression.

In other words, just putting these objects on the road will program them, creating an application.


"Is this for people who are good at programming and math and stuff?"

We hear you ask. Or:

"Drawing is hard, though. I can't do it, lol."

Or

"You're a programmer, right? Bring me your PC."

Well, you couldn't be more wrong.

You don't need to have an in-depth knowledge of programming.


All we'll say is that programming is the magic of the computing world.

Now, use whatever magic you like, and craft a human story that's unforgettable.

We encourage you to make let's plays and live streams!!
(However, doing so will be your own responsiblity.)

Place the Model and try running it.
Also, try placing and moving the Model.
Please see the Manual or Tutorial for details.
The click button differs depending on the VR controller, so please try it out.


[Contents]
Manual (HTML file)
Sample (Contains a number of Carp and rice files)
Readme(EN).txt (Text file)
Readme(Jp).txt (Text file)
Carp

item.title: Animated Jigsaw Puzzles
item.description: About This Game

item.title: Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles - Animals
item.description:
About This Game

Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles - Animals contains
  • 5 levels
  • 3000 puzzle pieces
  • Toggle-able background music
  • Hints
  • 5 Beautiful never before released pictures of animals

item.title: The Dark Story
item.description:
About This Game

welcome to the Dark story.

Get ready for a chilling adventure in a jungle mansion. Your task: survive, explore, and escape before the horrors within engulf you. Beware of jumpscares around every corner. Can you brave the darkness and uncover the secrets within?"
There is total of 5 chapters that are currently available and more chapters are coming soon. Each chapter contains minimum of 1-2
hour of gameplay time.

chapter 1: the Mansion

Step into the daunting horror mansion and embark on a quest for escape. Navigate chilling corridors, solve puzzles, and uncover the mysteries concealed within. Your challenge awaits in this atmospheric chapter.

chapter-2)basement Of Mythology

Having escaped the mansion's clutches, you now find yourself in the depths of a mysterious basement. The quest continues as you search for the key to unlock the secrets concealed in the profound layers below.

chapter-3)the Horrific Experiment

Activate the electricity and reach the lift before it devours you alive.


Chapter-4)Three Games OF LIfe & Death


In deep trouble, with an ominous presence hot on your heels, your only option is to run. How will you navigate the challenges of these three perilous games?

chapter-5)experiment Of Emr

Caught in the grip of the colossal EMR corporation, armed with dark secrets, your survival hinges on exposing the truth. Fight for your life or, for now, secure their experiment documents as crucial evidence.

chapter-6)coming Soon

Prepare for what's next as Chapter 6 approaches. Will it bring a challenging boss fight or another twist in your journey?

all the Best, Adventurer, In Your Journey.

item.title: Bunny Guntz
item.description:
About This Game

"Bunny Guntz" is a fast-paced combat game primarily focused on defense and survival. In this adventure filled with tension and threats, players assume the role of a member of the Bunny Warriors team, executing commands from the "Super System," traversing various dangerous realms worldwide, confronting threats from the demonic realm. Defeat these otherworldly enemies, earn system points, explore areas, and reach target locations to complete missions.

In single-player mode, players face all tasks alone, where any oversight can result in significant consequences. In cooperative mode for 2-4 players, collaboration with others becomes crucial in battling the threats from the demonic realm, emphasizing firepower and teamwork for survival.

Game Features:


Explore the World: Each level map boasts unique features, requiring players to discover weapon purchase locations, hidden rewards, and locate target destinations to create a distinctive gaming experience.

Incremental Difficulty: As the game progresses, enemies become faster and more aggressive, providing players with continuous challenges. Only by adapting and enhancing combat skills can one stand resilient against the terrifying onslaught.

Strategic Economic Planning: Defeating enemies yields points used to buy weapons, replenish ammunition, and unlock new areas. Prudent team point management is crucial for a path to victory.

Free and Rich Updates: The game plans to regularly release free updates, introducing new maps, enemy types, and weapons for players.

Important Notes:


This game contains flashing lights, which may cause discomfort for individuals with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitivity conditions. It is recommended that players exercise discretion in deciding whether it suits their preferences.

item.title: Hope
item.description:
About This Game

About this game


Welcome to the Utopian world of dreams 1+1<2
Class is rigid here, but there are few risk-takers
There is no freedom here, because there is only obedience
Everything here is in order
If you don't want to be someone else's tool, it's worth the risk

Is it bad to dream all the time?
Beautiful dream, but someone broke in
You're running away from here, or you're not
Someone you love in the dream, staying here all the time

Can't understand what I'm saying?

The game is a story game without words, no matter what country you are the player can easily pick up this game.
The game is a classic horizontal puzzle game, but you can turn into Superman at certain moments in the game, and solve puzzles with pause time and instant time backwards
There are certain levels in the game where you need to solve puzzles together with characters of certain abilities
The game is very humane, there are a lot of save points, explore the scene to find decorations and jump keys to add interest

item.title: The Lost Son
item.description:
About This Game

Story

Sean and Belle are on their way to visit their son for his birthday but suddenly they wake up in a mysterious world. Lost and confused, the couple ventures out into the unknown to find out where they are and where their son is.

Gameplay

In The Lost Son is a puzzle platformer where you play as two characters that you can switch between. Each character has a unique interaction with color. The blue character can only collide with blue barriers and pink circle can only collide with pink barriers. As simple as this constraint is it can create some interesting puzzles where you have to use both character's unique abilities to progress!

Solo Mode

Ready to take on the challenge all alone with that big brain of yours? In solo mode character switching is the key. Make sure to use both character's unique attributes and abilities to advance through the levels!

Work Together

Want to play with a friend? We've got you covered! In The Lost Son you can connect a controller to the game and it will automatically enter split-screen! Work together to beat the stages and have a blast! (Only works is there is one keyboard and one controller at the moment).

Required - Keyboard & Mouse

Co-op - A Keyboard & Mouse for the first player, and a controller for the 2nd player


Keyboard Controls

Move - Arrow Keys/A and D

Switch Characters (only in single player mode) - Tab

Pause - Escape

Jump - Z/Space

Stomp Attack - X/S

Air Dash - C/Left Click


Gamepad (2nd Player Only)

D-Pad/Left Stick - Move

Button South - Jump

Button North - Air Dash

Button East - Stomp Attack

item.title: NUKITASHI 2
item.description:
About This Game

A visual novel that describes the story of a man who wakes up and is transferred to a parallel world.

FEATURES

  • 1+ hours of story
  • Full Japanese voice acting by seasoned professionals

SUMMARY

It all happened after the grand adventure that was NUKITASHI...

The war is over, and Junnosuke Tachibana, savior of Seiran Island, spends his days with his buddies reminiscing over victories past. True coexistence has now been achieved, and peace will continue for years to come‚Äîor so he believes.

One fateful day, a grave data-related incident results in him breaking through the speed of light, transporting Junnosuke and his friends to a parallel world.

CHARACTERS


Touka Reizeiin (Voice: Sakura Hanazawa)

FS representative and student council president of Minotsuki Academy.
A girl with perfect looks and charisma‚Äîwho leads her peers in the parallel world as well.
Capable of overseeing everything from normal operations to strategic planning to direct combat and more, she is a major contender for Seiran‚Äôs strongest islander.
Outside of work, however, she is even clumsier and sloppier than Asane‚Äîand that‚Äôs putting it mildly.
Although she and Junnosuke are incompatible with each other due to their history, he has no choice but to look out for her here as she can barely take care of herself.


Rei Tadasugawa (Voice: Nanami Mizuno)

De facto second-in-charge as president of Minotsuki Academy‚Äôs disciplinary committee.
Her skills range from miscellaneous duties to battlefield command, though as a dedicated worker, she ends up being pushed around by Touka in her daily life. She is a bit depressed when she comes to the parallel world, but her cheerful antics still win out.
She is very close to Junnosuke and helps him in any way she can.


Ikuko Onabuta (Voice: Aria Kurata)

Commander of the First Squad, possessing the highest actual combat capability in Minotsuki Academy‚Äôs FS.
One of the strongest fighters in direct combat, she‚Äôs also a diehard battle fanatic who resents the existence of anyone stronger than she is, and has no qualms about making it known to anyone within shouting distance.
Always a maverick, her arrival in the parallel world reveals a side to her that catches Junnosuke by surprise.


Hinami Watarai (Voice: Shino Amekawa)

An older girl with a huge heart.
Put a folding chair in her hands and she can also dish out some mean DPS, more than earning her position as the team‚Äôs main attacker.


Nanase Katagiri (Voice: Hitomi Yanagi)

Junnosuke‚Äôs legendary classmate.
Filling a scouting role for the NLNS, she fights on the most dangerous of front lines armed with various nefarious spy items.


Misaki Hotori (Voice: Nagi Koharu)

Junnosuke‚Äôs quieter classmate.
Also a resident badass, riding all kinds of vehicles from bicycles to fighter jets.
Still somehow operates under the impression that she is plain and utterly unremarkable.


Asane Tachibana (Voice: Soramame.)

Junnosuke‚Äôs younger sister is a reclusive, foul-mouthed, and frequently difficult individual.
She develops spy items and controls the Ariadne Protocol escape assistance program.
However, she seems dissatisfied with her brother‚Äôs recent activities...


Fumino Kotoyose (Voice: Poplar Sawano)

A young woman believed to be the key to abolishing the old island order.
She serves as a sniper for the group, keeping Junnosuke out of harm‚Äôs way at a distance.


Susuko (Voice: Natyu Aizawa)

A junior member of the FS Fifth Division.
Ever smiling and energetic, she is not afraid of alt-world Junnosuke, insisting that he‚Äôs mentally still the same old insecure dweeb.
She loves to have fun and is often seen acting on that with Junnosuke.
That thing on her shoulder is her pet cockatoo.


Schubert (Voice: Makoto Kaburagi)

NO DATA...


Rin Hanamaru (Voice: Haru Amachi)

Hands down the biggest problem child of them all.
Already ruthlessly ambitious, in the parallel world, she‚Äôs now a devotee of a certain local god and does as she pleases upon receiving a divine revelation.
As the prideful ‚ÄúSHO Special Auditor‚Äôs Aide,‚Äù she is obsessed with bringing down Touka and alt-world Junnosuke, though it doesn‚Äôt usually go as planned.

item.title: Genso Chronicles
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a journey with Light, a resident of Selka Village, who, after joining the coveted Holos Over military, vows to protect his village. However, during a mission, the village falls prey to an unknown assailant, leaving it in ruins. In despair, Light hears the call of a guardian beast. To gain strength, Light follows the words of the guardian beast and fulfills a mystical contract.

Key Features:

1. Bonds with Companions and Guardian Beasts:

Forge deep connections with your comrades and guardian beasts. The stronger the bond, the more the guardian beasts unleash their power, enhancing collaboration with allies. The strength of these bonds can even influence the course of in-game events.

2. Forging and Strengthening:

Discover materials scattered across the field for forging and strengthening. Strengthen your weapons and armor by using these materials. Acquire forging books through missions or guild tasks, unlocking new variations for enhancements. Occasionally, this process may yield powerful weapons, adding a strategic layer to your arsenal.



Immerse yourself in a captivating world where bonds shape destiny, and strategic enhancements forge a path to victory. Will you answer the call of the Guardian Beasts and restore Light's village to its former glory? Join the adventure now!
